named-query.name: Category.FindAll
named-query.query: select c from Category c

named-query.name: Category.findByUserIdAndName
named-query.query: select c from Category c where c.user.id = :userId and c.name = :name

named-query.name: Category.findByUserId
named-query.query: select c from Category c where c.user.id = :userId

named-query.name: Task.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Task t

named-query.name: Task.findByUserId
named-query.query: select t from Task t where t.user.id = :userId

named-query.name: Task.findByTitleAndUserId
named-query.query: select t from Task t where t.title = :title and t.user.id = :userId

named-query.name: Task.findInboxTasksByUserId
named-query.query: select t from Task t where t.user.id = :userId and t.category is null and t.finished is null

named-query.name: Task.findTodayTasksByUserId
named-query.query: select t from Task t where t.user.id = :userId and t.planned <= CURRENT_DATE and t.finished is null order by t.planned asc

named-query.name: Task.findWeekTasksByUserId
named-query.query: select t from Task t where t.user.id = :userId and t.planned <= :fechaSemana and t.finished is null

named-query.name: Task.findUnfinishedTasksByCategoryId
named-query.query: select t from Task t where t.category.id = :categId and t.finished is null

named-query.name: Task.findFinishedTasksByCategoryId
named-query.query: select t from Task t where t.category.id = :categId and t.finished is not null

named-query.name: Task.findFinishedTasksInboxByUserId
named-query.query: select t from Task t where t.user.id = :userId and t.category is null and t.finished is not null

named-query.name: Task.findNumPlannedTasks
named-query.query: select count(t.id) from Task t where t.user.id = :userId and t.finished is null and t.planned is not null

named-query.name: Task.findNumNotPlannedTasks
named-query.query: select count(t.id) from Task t where t.user.id = :userId and t.finished is null and t.planned is null

named-query.name: Task.findNumFinishedTasks
named-query.query: select count(t.id) from Task t where t.user.id = :userId and t.finished is not null

named-query.name: Task.findNumFinishedDelayedTasks
named-query.query: select count(t.id) from Task t where t.user.id = :userId and t.finished is not null and t.planned < CURRENT_DATE

named-query.name: User.findAll
named-query.query: select u from User u

named-query.name: User.findByLogin
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.login = :login

named-query.name: User.findByLoginAndPassword
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.login = :login and u.password = :password

named-query.name: Task.findNotFinishedTasksByCategoryIdSortedByPlannedASC
named-query.query: select t from Task t where t.category.id = :category_id order by t.planned ASC
